experience.description: Spearheaded development of modular, scalable web applications using Python (FastAPI), JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Implemented advanced transaction analysis systems, data pipelines, and API integrations with cloud deployment on AWS.

Led multiple research initiatives focused on machine learning, transaction recurrence detection, and feature engineering. Built and evaluated ML models, authored technical documentation, and deployed data-driven services using Python.

Completed certified training in welding and fabrication. Applied structured problem-solving and precision work, contributing to a strong foundation for logical and technical thinking in later programming career.

certificates: ND2 Computer Science Academic Program – In Progress
Python for Everybody – University of Michigan (Coursera)
Automating Real-World Tasks with Python – Google/Coursera
